t: 6 Months Kirkland Minoxidil 5% Extra Strength Hair Loss Regrowth Treatment Men, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 6) + Free Shipping - Amazon.com
s: After 10 years of wondering, I finally tried it! One month in, I can see a difference. I gauge my thinning edges by how much I can see that freckle/mole in my hairline. ❤️ pic is 4/23, 🥳 pic is 5/23. Minoxidil WORKS. And the price of this brand can’t be beat!

s: It will take a long time for a ... Kirkland brand have reduce hair lost - less in the drain, but growth takes a long time so hard to say of new hair is growing, but less is falling out. ... I highly recommend this to anyone who’s been frustrated with using liquid minoxidil...
